DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this qualitative study is to evaluate the clarity and comprehensiveness of two disease-specific questionnaires, and to evaluate how effective these questionnaires are at assessing the quality of life and symptoms of patients with pheochromocytoma or paraganglioma.
DOC.brief_title: Content Validation of Quality of Life and Symptom Questionnaires for Pheochromocytoma and Paraganglioma
